entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - B703B06
entry.content:
Jul 13, 16:06 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/07/2023 14:25 UTC
End Time : 13/07/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Public network was temporarily unavailable for servers in rack B703B06
Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Identified - Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working to solve the problem

Jul 13, 14:39 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 13/07/2023 14:25 UTC
Service impact : Public network is temporarily unavailable for servers in rack B703B06
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
